name: The Crab Simulator
description:
You are a Crab stranded on an Island. If you want to win the game you have to eat all the available Algae. 

Press F to eat Algae.

But beware there are other crabs who want to eat you.

Attack with Mouse 1.

You win the game if you eat all the available Algae.

The Crab Simulator was made by me for the Unreal Game Jam 2022.

The Theme was As Above So Below. I found out that this was being used to also describe the tide. So I wanted to implement an Ebb and Flow System. The Water Plugin is still experimental and it bugged out when I scaled it, so my whole Idea could not be implemented. So I did this without the tide, and you can see for yourself what got out of it :).

I started with only 3 days left and no Unreal Engine Experience and I was surprised that I could build something so fast with Unreal Engine.

Paid Assets:

Atlantic Crab: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/atlantic-ghost-crab

Beach Assets: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/olbert-s-low-poly-beach

Free Assets:

Quixel: Sand

Eating Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/rabbit-eating
